duty.title: Duty
duty.on: You are now on duty for %s as %s!
duty.off: You are now off duty for %s as %s!

error.invalid_group_permission: You do not have permission to toggle duty for group %s
error.invalid_group_zone: You do not have permission to toggle duty for group %s in zone %s
error.not_in_zone: Player is not inside the duty zone
